    Authors and Citation

    Authors

    • Simon R Parker. Author, maintainer.

    • Linda Vesel. Data contributor, contributor.

    • Eric O Ohuma. Data contributor, contributor.

    • Chitra Saraswati. Reviewer.

    • Victor Ordu. Reviewer.

    • Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. Funder.

    • London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine. Copyright holder.

    Citation

    Source: inst/CITATION
